Title: Straw Dog (2)
Plot: Someone possibly copying the past crimes begins harassing Grace about her testimony against Tony Greene. If she doesn't admit that she was wrong about him, the assailant promises to murder the victim he/she is holding hostage.
ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Tilly Vosburgh,  Joe van Moyland,  Andrew Turner,  Natalie  Robb,  Dave Norman,  Ovidiu Matesan,  Emma Lowndes,  Dominic Kemp,  Billy Keating,  Terence Hillyer,  Christopher Godwin,  Paul Freeman,  Tom Ellis,  Am
